General.Name: Ha Tien 1 Cement JSC
General.Description: Ha Tien 1 Cement Joint Stock Company manufactures and sells cement, cement products, and construction materials in Vietnam. The company offers bricks, tiles, mortar, concrete, clinker, stone, sand, gravel, clay, and other raw materials. It is also involved in the real estate, civil construction, construction investment, scrap recycling, and waste collection and treatment businesses. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
